trans-unit.source: Implements one row in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> 中的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Grid items represent the hierarchy of the view into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 方格項目代表的階層檢視<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> to obtain information about the grid's state and contents.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>取得方格的狀態和內容相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> objects should not be cached because they represent a snapshot of the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> at the time they are accessed, and grid activity might dispose them.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> 應該快取物件，因為它們代表狀態的快照集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>同時存取它們，和方格活動可能會處置它們。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> often recreates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> objects internally without changing the view to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>通常會重新建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>內部沒有將檢視變更為使用者的物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the specified property is expandable to show nested properties.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得值，指出是否可以擴展指定的屬性以顯示巢狀的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified property can be expanded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的屬性可以擴充，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is false.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 false。

trans-unit.source: If a property is expandable, a plus (+) sign is displayed by the property name in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性是可展開，加號 （+） 中的屬性名稱會顯示登<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>。

trans-unit.source: If the plus sign is clicked and no nested properties are available, the plus sign is then removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下加號和任何巢狀的屬性可用，然後移除加號。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> is in an expanded state.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 是否處於可以展開的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.Expanded" /> property was set to <see langword="true" />, but a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> is not expandable.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.Expanded" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" />，但是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 無法擴充。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> objects, if any, associated as a child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 物件集合 (如果有的話)，使它成為這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 的子資料表。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 的型別。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Property?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you must also ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A> has a valid value.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>型別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Property?displayProperty=nameWithType>，您還必須確定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A>具有有效的值。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Root?displayProperty=nameWithType> the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.Parent%2A> property must be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>型別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Root?displayProperty=nameWithType><xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.Parent%2A>屬性必須是`null`。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the text of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 的文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the text associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 相關的文字。

trans-unit.source: This class gets the text that displays in the left column of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會取得在格線左側資料行中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text retrieved can be different from the actual property name of the property represented by this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的文字可能會不同於所表示之屬性的實際內容名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>。

trans-unit.source: You can get the name for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Property?displayProperty=nameWithType> by retrieving the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A> and checking its <xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得的名稱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>型別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Property?displayProperty=nameWithType>藉由擷取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.PropertyDescriptor%2A>並檢查其<xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor.Name%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />, if any.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 的父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> representing the parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 的父代 (Parent)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.GridItemType%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Root?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this value will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem.GridItemType%2A>如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Root?displayProperty=nameWithType>，這個值會`null`。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 相關的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is only valid for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem> of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Property?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯一有效的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem>型別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridItemType.Property?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to retrieve information such as the property type of the grid item, the name of the grid item, or the type converter for the grid item.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來擷取資訊，例如方格項目、 方格項目或型別轉換子的方格項目名稱的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, selects this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 中選取這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the selection is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果選取成功，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets user-defined data about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 有關的使用者定義資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含有關 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 的資料。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current value of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The current value of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridItem" /> 的目前值。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是 <see langword="null" />。
